text: Crosstown Line may refer to the following transit lines: ==New York City== *IND Crosstown Line in New York (rapid transit) *Crosstown Line (Brooklyn surface) (bus, formerly streetcar) *39th Street Crosstown Line on Church Avenue in Brooklyn (bus, formerly streetcar) ==Toronto== *Line 5 Eglinton, an under-construction rapid transit line in Toronto, Ontario, Canada, also known as the Crosstown Line ==Washington D.C.== *Crosstown Line (Washington, D.C.) (bus line)
title: Crosstown Line
